signatures.desc: Sorts the array in-place according to the natural order of its elements.

signatures.text: fun <T : Comparable<T>> Array<out T>.sort( fromIndex: Int = 0, toIndex: Int = size)
signatures.desc: Sorts a range in the array in-place.

signatures.text: fun ByteArray.sort(fromIndex: Int = 0, toIndex: Int = size)
signatures.desc: Sorts a range in the array in-place.

signatures.text: @ExperimentalUnsignedTypes fun UIntArray.sort( fromIndex: Int = 0, toIndex: Int = size)
signatures.desc: Sorts a range in the array in-place.
Sorts elements in the list in-place according to their natural sort order.

signatures.text: @DeprecatedSinceKotlin("1.6") fun <T> Array<out T>.sort( comparison: (a: T, b: T) -> Int)
signatures.desc: Sorts the array in-place according to the order specified by the given comparison function.

signatures.text: @DeprecatedSinceKotlin("1.6") inline fun ByteArray.sort( noinline comparison: (a: Byte, b: Byte) -> Int)
signatures.desc: Sorts the array in-place according to the order specified by the given comparison function.
